amendment.description: An amendment numbered 39 printed in Part B of House Report 118-269 to prohibit the Small Business Administration from implementing the CA SBLC program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bean (FL) amendment (A017) Failed by recorded vote: 205 - 220 (Roll no. 631).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Bean (FL) amendment (A017) Failed by recorded vote: 205 - 220 (Roll no. 631).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
